alert.note: Alert for St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. John The Baptist, southeastern St. James and northern Lafourche Parishes through 330 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chackbay, or near Thibodaux, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, North Vacherie, Chackbay, South Vacherie and Wallace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche
